full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 365 Filed 10/22/21 Page 24 of 40 Juror ID: 43a4 4a. If yes, please explain: 44.45 Have you or a family member ever supported, lobbied, petitioned, protested, or worked in any other manner for or against any laws or, regulations, or organizations relating to sex trafficking, sex crimes against minors, or sex abuse generally, or sexual harassment? Yes No 44a4 5a. If yes, please explain when and what you or your family member did: 44b4 5b. If your answer to 44 45 was yes, do you believe that this would affect your ability to serve fairly and impartially as a juror in this case? Yes No 44c4 5c. If yes to 44b 45b, please explain: 45.46 The witnesses in this case may include law enforcement witnesses. Would you have any difficulty assessing the credibility of a law enforcement officer just like you would any other witness? Yes No 45a4 6a. If yes, please explain: -23- DOJ-OGR-00005300
